item.title: NICHOLAS FINANCIAL INC 10-K
item.description: NICHOLAS FINANCIAL INC, which is in the Short-Term Business Credit Institutions [6153] industry, SEC 10-K filing on June 22, 2021 had 22470 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
